body.para:
Hi Ricardo, I tried out with *.html and /faces/* but still no luck. Meanwhile I start a complete new appfuse application (1.9) and only add a to keep it simple as possible. In the web.xml I add only one filtermapping. The
*.html mapping was there:

Thats all. the Dialog Box of the inputDate appears and is working. The
Javascript gimmic with the Calandar Popup does not. Can you (or somebody else)
please send me your web.xml? And maybe a JSF example that is working?
